t=int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n,m=map(int,input().split())
    mat=[0 for i in range(n)]
    #mat=[[0 for i in range(n)] for j in range(n)]
    for i in range(m):
     u,v=map(int,input().split())
     u,v=(u-1),(v-1)
     mat[u]|=(1<<v)
     mat[v]|=(1<<u)
    for i in range(n):
     mat[i]|=(1<<i)    
 
    goal=(2**n)-1
    ans=n

    for i in range(1,goal+1):
     mvs=0
     loc=0
     for j in range(n):
      if(i&(1<<j)):
       loc|=mat[j]
       mvs+=1
     if(loc==goal):
      ans=min(mvs,ans)
    print(ans)
